name: 2025 The 5th International Forum on Signal Processing
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1085-8), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
organizers: Xi'an University of Posts & Telecommunications, China
